## Checklist

- [ ] I have verified this is a legitimate spatial audio release
- [ ] The music link works and points to the correct track
- [ ] The Apple Music link includes the track ID (`?i=` parameter)
- [ ] Release dates are in YYYY-MM-DD format
- [ ] I have checked this track is not already in the database
- [ ] All required information is provided above
